summary: This document consists of Bureau of Prisons count sheets and inmate roster pages from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 9, 2019. It records official inmate counts by housing unit and includes an inmate roster showing assignments, with some inmates marked for suicide watch or unassigned status.

events.title: Daily inmate count at MCC New York
events.description: Official inmate count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, recording 758 total inmates across various housing units with verification counts showing 754 inmates.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: Document shows prison administrative records from August 9, 2019, the day Jeffrey Epstein died in custody.
Total inmate count recorded as 758 with verification count of 754 at Metropolitan Correctional Center New York.
Inmate roster includes assignments marked 'SUICIDE OR SUICIDE OR UNASSG' indicating suicide watch protocols.
Document is part of prison operations paperwork from the facility where Epstein was held.
